constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 14 (Monday, January 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CALVERT:
H.R. 453.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution relating to the power to make all laws necessary
and proper for carrying out the powers vested in Congress.
[Page H232]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: HELD Act
